title: Distributive Property Explanation
text: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.
speech: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.
pacedSpeech: The distributive property is defined as when you multiply a number by a sum or difference, you have to multiply each term of the sum or difference by that number.

title: Splitting Sums
text: Split the $$\frac{sum}{difference}$$ that has the least amount of terms into its individual terms, to use the distributive property with.
speech: Split the  fraction, s u m, over difference,   that has the least amount of terms into its individual terms, to use the distributive property with.

that has the least amount of terms into its individual terms, to use the distributive property with.

title: Splitting Sums
text: In this case, we will split the $$4t^2-1$$ into $$4t^2$$ and $$-1$$.
speech: In this case, we will split the  4 t squared, minus, 1  into  4 t squared,  and  negative 1 .

title: Multiplying Individual Terms
text: Multiply each term from the split difference to the other $$\frac{sum}{difference}$$.

title: Multiplying Individual Terms
text: In this case, we will multiple $$4t^2$$ by $$4t^2+t-7$$ and $$-1$$ by $$4t^2+t-7$$
speech: In this case, we will multiple  4 t squared,  by  4 t squared plus t minus, 7  and  negative 1  by  4 t squared plus t minus 7

title: Adding Terms
text: Add all the terms generated after both multiplications and simplify like terms

title: Simplification
text: Simplify like terms in the sum. Like terms are terms of the same degree.
speech: Simplify like terms in the sum. Like terms are terms of the same degree.
